get_valid_samples

Source: R/utils.R
get_valid_samples.Rd

Checks if there are at least 3 samples with a minimum number of cells, returning valid sample names if the condition is met.

Usage

get_valid_samples(input, subject_ids, min_cells)

Arguments

input

A Seurat object containing metadata

subject_ids

The name of the metadata column containing subject IDs

min_cells

Minimum cells per subject

Value

A vector of sample names meeting the criteria, or NULL if the requirement is not met

Details

This function inspects the metadata to ensure there are at least 3 samples with min_cells. If this condition is not satisfied, the function returns NULL and issues a warning.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# `seurat_obj` is a Seurat object with a metadata column "sample_id":
get_valid_samples(seurat_obj, "sample_id", 50)
} # }
